TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract TileBrush extends System.Windows.Media.Brush
Public MustInherit Class TileBrush Inherits Brush
public ref class TileBrush abstract : System::Windows::Media::Brush

summary.span: 描述使用一个或多个图块绘制区域的方法。

span.span: Describes a way to paint a region by using one or more tiles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的类定义用于绘制区域的磁贴的内容。The derived classes of define the contents of the tiles that you use to paint a region. 例如，使用类通过图像绘制区域。For example, use the class to paint an area by using an image. 使用来控制如何绘制区域。Use a to control how you paint an area. 例如，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]提供几种类型的画笔：For example, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] provides several types of brushes: - 若要绘制使用的映像，请使用。To paint by using an image, use the . - 若要绘制的绘图，请使用。To paint by drawing, use the . - 若要通过使用绘制，使用。To paint by using a , use the . 当你使用绘制区域，而不是通过使用单个的拉伸的图像绘制区域可以绘制区域使用一系列创建一种模式的图像磁贴。When you use the to paint an area, instead of painting an area by using a single stretched image, you can paint an area by using a series of image tiles that create a pattern. 当使用绘制区域，使用三个组件： 内容、 磁贴和输出区域。When you paint an area by using a , you use three components: content, tiles, and the output area. 下图显示了这三个组件互相关联起来。The following illustrations show how these three components relate to each other. ![TileBrush 组件](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-defaultcontentprojection2.png "TileBrush 组件")![TileBrush components](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-defaultcontentprojection2.png "TileBrush components") 具有单个图块的 TileBrush 的组成部分Components of a TileBrush with a single tile ![平铺的 TileBrush 的组成部分](~/add/media/graphicsmm-tiledprojection.png "的平铺 TileBrush 组件")![Components of a tiled TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-tiledprojection.png "Components of a tiled TileBrush") 已指定图块的 TileMode 的 TileBrush 的组成部分Components of a TileBrush with a TileMode of Tile **内容**:一个可以具有不同类型的内容：**Content**: A can have different types of content: - 如果画笔为，此内容是一个图像。If the brush is an , this content is an image. 属性指定的内容。The property specifies the contents of the . - 如果画笔为，此内容为绘图。If the brush is a , this content is a drawing. 属性指定的内容。The property specifies the contents of the . - 如果画笔为，此内容为视觉对象。If the brush is a , this content is a visual. 属性指定的内容。The property specifies the content of the . 可以指定的位置和尺寸内容使用属性。You can specify the position and dimensions of content by using the property. **磁贴**:一个生成一个或多个磁贴。**Tiles**: A produces one or more tiles. 默认情况下，画笔的内容被拉伸以填充单个磁贴，该磁贴拉伸以填充输出区域。By default, the content of the brush is stretched to fill a single tile and that tile is stretched to fill the output area. 属性用于指定的大小和位置的基本图块。The property is used to specify the size and position of the base tile for the . 属性确定是否大小和位置相对于输出区域 （默认行为），或者是否是绝对值。The property determines whether the size and position of the are relative to the output area (the default behavior) or whether they are absolute values. **输出区域**:输出区域是区域的画笔绘制，如的或的。**Output Area**: The output area is the area that the brush paints, such as the of an or the of a . 有关详细信息类，请参阅[使用图像、 绘图和视觉对象进行绘制](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-images-drawings-and-visuals.md)。For more information about the class, see [Painting with Images, Drawings, and Visuals](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-images-drawings-and-visuals.md) . ## Freezable 功能Freezable Features 一个是类型。A is a type. 关于功能，例如冻结和克隆，请参阅[Freezable 对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For information about features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

para.span: 继承自类，必须重写方法。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, you must override the method.

para.span: 有关继承的详细信息类型，请参阅[Freezable 对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

span.span: For more information about inheriting from types, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置 基本图块中内容的水平对齐。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of content in the base tile.

value.span: 一个值，指定 内容在其基本图块中的水平位置。

span.span: A value that specifies the horizontal position of content in its base tile.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 并的属性使用以下条件之一为 true:The and properties of a are used when either of the following conditions is true: - 属性是或并且和的纵横比。The property is or and the and have different aspect ratios. - 属性是并和大小并不相同。The property is and the and are different sizes. 请注意，指定的尺寸通过使用内容属性; 您可以指定的位置和大小使用的基本图块属性。Note that you specify the dimensions of content by using the property; you specify the position and size of the base tile by using the property. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法生成的只读的可修改副本对象。Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only objects. 为方便起见，此方法隐藏继承的版本使用的强类型实现。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 此方法复制依赖项属性，它会复制资源引用和数据绑定，但它们可能不再解析。When this method copies dependency properties, it copies resource references and data bindings although they might no longer resolve. 不复制动画或其当前值。It does not copy animations or their current values. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Stretch Stretch { System::Windows::Media::Stretch get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Stretch value); };
member this.Stretch : System.Windows.Media.Stretch with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定此 的内容如何拉伸以适合其图块。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies how the content of this stretches to fit its tiles.

value.span: 一个值，指定此 内容如何投影到其基本图块上。

span.span: A value that specifies how this content is projected onto its base tile.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性接受以下值，其中枚举定义：The property accepts the following values, which the enumeration defines: - :内容不会拉伸以填充磁贴。: The content does not stretch to fill the tile. - :缩放内容以适应磁贴尺寸。: The content is scaled to fit the tile dimensions. 但是，保留内容的纵横比。However, the aspect ratio of the content is preserved. - :内容进行缩放，以便完全填充输出区域，但保留其原始长宽比。: The content is scaled so that it completely fills the output area but preserves its original aspect ratio. - :缩放内容以适合图块。: The content is scaled to fit the tile. 由于内容的高度和宽度独立进行缩放，因此内容的原始纵横比可能不会保留。Because the content's height and width are scaled independently, the original aspect ratio of the content might not be preserved. 也就是说，内容可能会失真为了完全填充输出图块。That is, the content might be distorted in order to completely fill the output tile. 下图阐释了不同设置。The following image illustrates the different settings. ![不同的 TileBrush 拉伸设置](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-stretchenum.jpg "不同的 TileBrush 拉伸设置")![Different TileBrush Stretch settings](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-stretchenum.jpg "Different TileBrush Stretch settings") 不同的拉伸设置Different stretch settings 请注意，指定的尺寸通过使用内容属性; 您可以指定的位置和大小使用的基本图块属性。Note that you specify the dimensions of content by using the property; you specify the position and size of the base tile by using the property. ## Viewbox 剪辑Viewbox Clipping 永远不会将内容剪辑到。contents are never clipped to the . 但是，内容*都*剪辑到的边缘，用于设置的尺寸为基本图块。However, contents *are* clipped to the edges of the , which sets the dimensions for the base tile. 下图显示了不同的效果上的设置具有小于其。The following illustration shows the effect of different settings on a that has a that is smaller than its . 外部图像的部分色调为灰色。The parts of the image that are outside the are tinted gray. ![具有不同拉伸设置的 TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-viewbox-clipping.png "具有不同拉伸设置的 TileBrush")![TileBrush with different Stretch settings](~/add/media/graphicsmm-viewbox-clipping.png "TileBrush with different Stretch settings") 具有不同拉伸设置的 TileBrushTileBrush with different Stretch settings ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::TileMode TileMode { System::Windows::Media::TileMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::TileMode value); };
member this.TileMode : System.Windows.Media.TileMode with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定当基本图块小于输出区域时 如何填充您所绘制的区域。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies how a fills the area that you are painting if the base tile is smaller than the output area.

value.span: 一个值，该值指定当 属性指定的基本图块小于输出区域时 图块如何填充输出区域。

span.span: A value that specifies how the tiles fill the output area when the base tile, which is specified by the property, is smaller than the output area.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图显示了不同的平铺模式的定义由枚举。The following illustration shows the different tile modes, which are defined by the enumeration. ![不同的 TileBrush TileMode 设置](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-tilemodes.gif "不同的 TileBrush TileMode 设置")![Different TileBrush TileMode settings](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-tilemodes.gif "Different TileBrush TileMode settings") TileMode 枚举的可用平铺模式Available tile modes for the TileMode enumeration 有关属性产生任何影响，必须设置的大小，小于所绘制 （输出区域） 的区域的画笔。For the property to have an effect, you must set the for the brush to a size that is smaller than the area that you are painting (the output area). 如果大小等于或超过输出区域，画笔将生成将展开以填充输出区域中，并且没有平铺图案的单个磁贴会发生。If the size is equal to or exceeds the output area, the brush produces a single tile that expands to fill the output area, and no tile pattern occurs. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取或设置 图块中内容的位置和尺寸。

span.span: Gets or sets the position and dimensions of the content in a tile.
The position and dimensions of the content.

value.span: 默认值是一个矩形 ()，其 为 (0,0)， 和 为 1。

span.span: The default value is a rectangle () that has a of (0,0), and a and of 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用绘制区域，使用三个组件： 内容、 磁贴和输出区域。When you paint an area by using a , you use three components: content, tiles, and the output area. 属性指定的大小和位置内容。The property specifies the size and position of content. 下图显示了这三个组件互相关联起来。The following illustration shows how these three components relate to each other. ![TileBrush 组件](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-defaultcontentprojection2.png "TileBrush 组件")![TileBrush components](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-defaultcontentprojection2.png "TileBrush components") TileBrush 组件TileBrush components ![平铺的 TileBrush 的组成部分](~/add/media/graphicsmm-tiledprojection.png "的平铺 TileBrush 组件")![Components of a tiled TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-tiledprojection.png "Components of a tiled TileBrush") 属性确定是否值解释为相对或绝对的值。The property determines whether the value is interpreted as a relative or absolute value. 默认情况下， 属性设置为 。By default, the property is set to . ## Viewbox 剪辑Viewbox Clipping 永远不会将内容剪辑到。contents are never clipped to the . 但是，内容*都*剪辑到的边缘，用于设置基本图块的值。However, contents *are* clipped to the edges of the , which sets the values for the base tile. 下图显示了不同的效果上的设置具有小于其。The following illustration shows the effect of different settings on a that has a that is smaller than its . 外部图像的部分色调为灰色。The parts of the image that are outside the are tinted gray. ![具有不同拉伸设置的 TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-viewbox-clipping.png "具有不同拉伸设置的 TileBrush")![TileBrush with different Stretch settings](~/add/media/graphicsmm-viewbox-clipping.png "TileBrush with different Stretch settings") 具有不同拉伸设置的 TileBrushTileBrush with different Stretch settings ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 可以指定的大小和位置内容使用属性。You can specify the size and position of content by using the property. 属性确定是否值是相对于边界内容或它是否是一个绝对值。The property determines whether the value is relative to the bounds of the content or whether it is an absolute value. 第一张图显示了一个 100 通过 100 像素的图像，然后使用此映像显示的不同效果属性设置。The first illustration shows a 100 by 100 pixel image and then uses this image to show the effects of different property settings. ![图像](~/add/media/graphicsmm-viewbox-sampleimage.jpg "图像")![An image](~/add/media/graphicsmm-viewbox-sampleimage.jpg "An image") 从示例图像 （100 通过 100 设备无关的像素）Beginning sample image (100 by 100 device independent pixels) 下图显示的输出，它使用的 0.0,0.0，0.25,0.5。The following illustration shows the output of a that uses a of 0.0,0.0, 0.25,0.5. 其他相关的属性值包括：Other relevant property values include the following: - : （默认值）: (default) - :0,0,1,1: 0,0,1,1 - :: - , :, : 此图显示了若干种不同属性设置。This illustration shows several different property settings. 属性确定如何拉伸其以填充其。The property determines how a stretches its to fill its . ![Viewbox 为 0，0 0.25,0.5 TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-0-0-025-05-viewbox.png "viewbox 为 0，0 0.25,0.5 的 TileBrush")![TileBrush with a Viewbox of 0,0 0.25,0.5](~/add/media/graphicsmm-0-0-025-05-viewbox.png "TileBrush with a Viewbox of 0,0 0.25,0.5") TileBrush 0.0,0.0，相对 Viewbox 0.25,0.5TileBrush with a relative Viewbox of 0.0,0.0, 0.25,0.5 下图显示一个类似但相对的 0.5,0.25，0.25,0.5。The next illustration shows a similar but with a relative of 0.5,0.25, 0.25,0.5. ![Viewbox 0.5,0.25 0.25,0.5](~/add/media/graphicsmm-05-0-025-05-viewbox.png "0.5,0.25 0.25,0.5 Viewbox")![TileBrush with a Viewbox of 0.5,0.25 0.25,0.5](~/add/media/graphicsmm-05-0-025-05-viewbox.png "TileBrush with a Viewbox of 0.5,0.25 0.25,0.5") 类似的 TileBrush，但使用不同的 Viewbox 设置Similar TileBrush but with a different Viewbox setting 下图显示相同但相对0.0,0.0，值 0.5，0.5 和一个的。The next illustration shows the same but with a relative value of 0.0,0.0, 0.5,0.5 and a of . ![Viewbox 的 0.5,0.25 0.25,0.5](~/add/media/graphicsmm-05-0-025-05-viewbox-tiled.png "的 0.5,0.25 0.25,0.5 Viewbox")![TiledTileBrush with a Viewbox of 0.5,0.25 0.25,0.5](~/add/media/graphicsmm-05-0-025-05-viewbox-tiled.png "TiledTileBrush with a Viewbox of 0.5,0.25 0.25,0.5") 类似的 TileBrush，但使用平铺和不同的视区设置Similar TileBrush but with tiling and a different Viewport setting 下面的示例演示如何创建平铺具有的 0.5,0.25，0.25,0.5。The following example shows how to create a tiled that has a of 0.5,0.25, 0.25,0.5. [!code-xaml[BrushOverviewExamples_snip#GraphicsMMTileBrushViewboxWithStretchTiling](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BrushOverviewExamples_snip/XAML/ViewboxExample.xaml#graphicsmmtilebrushviewboxwithstretchtiling)] [!code-csharp[BrushOverviewExamples_procedural_snip#GraphicsMMTileBrushViewboxWithStretchTiling](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BrushOverviewExamples_procedural_snip/CSharp/ViewboxExample.cs#graphicsmmtilebrushviewboxwithstretchtiling)] [!code-vb[BrushOverviewExamples_procedural_snip#GraphicsMMTileBrushViewboxWithStretchTiling](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BrushOverviewExamples_procedural_snip/visualbasic/viewboxexample.vb#graphicsmmtilebrushviewboxwithstretchtiling)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 值是相对于 内容的边界框而言，还是绝对值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the value is relative to the bounding box of the contents or whether the value is absolute.

value.span: 一个值，该值指示 值是相对于 内容的边界框而言，还是绝对值。

span.span: A value that indicates whether the value is relative to the bounding box of the contents or whether it is an absolute value.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值为指示相对于内容的边界框。A value of indicates that the are relative to the bounding box of the content. 请注意，值为指定设备无关的像素，而不是设备的像素与设备相关。Note that a value of specifies device independent pixels instead of device pixels, which are device dependent. 因此，如果值为适用，每个像素表示 1/96th 每英寸。Therefore, when a value of applies, each pixel represents 1/96th of an inch. 指定时，必须记住此像素差别的具有作为其源。You must remember this pixel distinction when you specify the of an that has a as its source. 例如，当您使用标准的像素作为度量值，300 300 像素的图像时只有 1 英寸的宽度的图像分辨率是 300 点 / 英寸。For example, when you use the standard pixel as a measure, a 300 by 300 pixel image is only one inch in width if the image resolution is 300 dots per inch. 但是，当你想要设置一个绝对的值，必须设置到 （0，0，96，96） 包含整个图像。However, when you want to set an absolute value, you must set the to (0, 0, 96, 96) in order to include the whole image. 可以指定的大小和位置内容使用属性。You can specify the size and position of content by using the property. 属性确定是否值是相对于边界内容或它是否是一个绝对值。The property determines whether the value is relative to the bounds of the content or whether it is an absolute value. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

member this.Viewport : System.Windows.Rect with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 的基本图块的位置和尺寸。

span.span: Gets or sets the position and dimensions of the base tile for a .

value.span: 的基本图块的位置和尺寸。

span.span: The position and dimensions of the base tile for a .

value.span: 默认值是一个矩形 ()，其 为 (0,0)， 和 为 1。

span.span: The default value is a rectangle () with a of (0,0) and a and of 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用绘制区域，使用三个组件： 内容、 磁贴和输出区域。When you paint an area by using a , you use three components: content, tiles, and the output area. 下图显示了这三个组件互相关联起来。The following illustration shows how these three components relate to each other. ![TileBrush 组件](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-defaultcontentprojection2.png "TileBrush 组件")![TileBrush components](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-defaultcontentprojection2.png "TileBrush components") 具有单个图块的 TileBrush 的组成部分Components of a TileBrush with a single tile ![平铺的 TileBrush 的组成部分](~/add/media/graphicsmm-tiledprojection.png "的平铺 TileBrush 组件")![Components of a tiled TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-tiledprojection.png "Components of a tiled TileBrush") 已指定图块的 TileMode 的 TileBrush 的组成部分Components of a TileBrush with a TileMode of Tile 属性确定的大小和位置中的磁贴。The property determines the size and position of the tiles in a . 默认情况下，具有单个磁贴可填充整个输出区域。By default, a has a single tile that fills the whole output area. 属性控制如何内容适合该磁贴。The property controls how the content fits into that tile. 可以重写此默认行为并使用指定的磁贴大小属性。You can override this default behavior and specify the tile size by using the property. 使用属性指定是否使用绝对或相对坐标。Use the property to specify whether the uses absolute or relative coordinates. 如果坐标是相对坐标，则它们相对于输出区域的大小。If the coordinates are relative, they are relative to the size of the output area. 点 (0，0) 表示输出区域和 (1，1) 表示的右下角的输出区域的左上角。The point (0,0) represents the upper-left corner of the output area, and (1,1) represents the lower-right corner of the output area. 若要指定的属性使用绝对坐标，设置属性设置为。To specify that the property uses absolute coordinates, set the property to . 下图显示了输出中的差异，当您设置属性的到相对或绝对。The following illustration shows the difference in output when you set the property of a to either relative or absolute. ![绝对和相对视区单位](~/add/media/absolute-and-relative-viewports.png "绝对和相对视区单位")![Absolute and Relative Viewport Units](~/add/media/absolute-and-relative-viewports.png "Absolute and Relative Viewport Units") 相对和绝对 ViewportUnitsRelative and absolute ViewportUnits ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 枚举，该枚举指定 的值（该值指示 基本图块的大小和位置）是否相对于输出区域的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a enumeration that specifies whether the value of the , which indicates the size and position of the base tile, is relative to the size of the output area.

value.span: 指示 的值（该值描述 图块的大小和位置）是否相对于整个输出区域的大小而言。

span.span: Indicates whether the value of the , which describes the size and position of the tiles, is relative to the size of the whole output area.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定的大小和位置中的磁贴。The property determines the size and position of the tiles in a . 默认情况下，具有单个磁贴可填充整个输出区域。By default, a has a single tile that fills the whole output area. 属性控制如何内容适合该磁贴。The property controls how the content fits into that tile. 可以重写此默认行为并使用指定的磁贴大小属性。You can override this default behavior and specify the tile size by using the property. 使用属性指定是否使用绝对或相对坐标。Use the property to specify whether the uses absolute or relative coordinates. 如果坐标是相对坐标，则它们相对于输出区域的大小。If the coordinates are relative, they are relative to the size of the output area. 点 (0，0) 表示输出区域和 (1，1) 表示的右下角的输出区域的左上角。The point (0,0) represents the upper-left corner of the output area, and (1,1) represents the lower-right corner of the output area. 若要指定的属性使用绝对坐标，设置属性设置为。To specify that the property uses absolute coordinates, set the property to . 下图显示了输出中的差异，当您设置属性的到相对或绝对。The following illustration shows the difference in output when you set the property of a to either relative or absolute. ![绝对和相对视区单位](~/add/media/absolute-and-relative-viewports.png "绝对和相对视区单位")![Absolute and Relative Viewport Units](~/add/media/absolute-and-relative-viewports.png "Absolute and Relative Viewport Units") 相对和绝对 ViewportUnitsRelative and absolute ViewportUnits ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
